standard = StandardScaler()

source.b78827e7:
# initializing model
classifier = Sequential()
# First Layer
classifier.add(Dense(units = 12, kernel_initializer = 'he_uniform',activation='relu',input_dim = 11))
classifier.add(Dropout(0.3))

# Second Layer
classifier.add(Dense(units = 15, kernel_initializer = 'he_uniform',activation='relu',input_dim = 11))
classifier.add(Dropout(0.2))

# Third Layer
classifier.add(Dense(units=10, kernel_initializer='he_uniform', activation='relu'))
classifier.add(Dropout(0.4))

# Output Layer
classifier.add(Dense(units=1, kernel_initializer='glorot_uniform', activation='sigmoid'))
source.b6e54afb:
classifier.compile(optimizer='Adamax', loss='binary_crossentropy', metrics=['accuracy'])

model_history = classifier.fit(x_train,y_train, validation_split=0.30, batch_size=10, epochs=100 )
source.8db7a238:
y_pred = classifier.predict(x_test)
y_pred = (y_pred > 0.5)

cm = confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred)

score=accuracy_score(y_pred,y_test)

print(f'Accuracy : {score}')
